system.effect: Trigger - The user is hit with a Melee attack\nThe triggering creature and the user each receive a Perish Count of 3. At the beginning of each of the target’s turns, their Perish count is lowered by 1. Once a Perish Count reaches 0, set the Pokémon’s Hit Points to 0. A Perish Count disappears if a target returns to their Poké Ball, Takes a Breather, or is knocked out. Perish Body never causes Massive Damage. Defensive.
